verses.verse: And Elisha<WH477> the prophet<WH5030> called<WH7121> one<WH259> of the children<WH1121> of the prophets<WH5030>, and said<WH559> unto him, Gird up<WH2296> thy loins<WH4975>, and take<WH3947> this box<WH6378> of oil<WH8081> in thine hand<WH3027>, and go<WH3212> to Ramothgilead<WH7433> <WH1568>:
